blocks.content: Welcome to Tina's public roadmap! This is a live document, and will be updated regularly. To submit an idea, or to view a list of feature requests and ideas that we're considering, check out our [GitHub Discussions](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/discussions "GitHub Discussions")

items.headline: GitHub Enterprise Support
items.content: TinaCloud now supports connecting to GitHub enterprise on-premise installations.

items.headline: 2FA Authentication
items.content: Strengthens security for TinaCloud users by adding an extra layer of protection to prevent unauthorized access, ensuring safer content management.

items.headline: Vercel Data Cache Support
items.content:
Hosting on Vercel? This enhances TinaCMS performance by leveraging Vercel’s data caching to speed up content delivery, reduce API load, and improve editing responsiveness.

[https://tina.io/blog/optimizing-tinacms-with-nextjs-and-vercel-data-cache](https://tina.io/blog/optimizing-tinacms-with-nextjs-and-vercel-data-cache)

items.headline: TinaCloud Performance
items.content:
Improvements to our Content API - faster response times for content retrieval. This will improve static site build times for quicker deployments. For enterprise customers, we are adding data isolation, ensuring their data remains separate from other accounts for better security and scalability.

[https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/discussions/5576](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/discussions/5576)

items.headline: React 19 Support
items.content:
Enhances TinaCMS with improved performance, more efficient rendering, and better compatibility with modern React features.

[https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/issues/5244](https://github.com/tinacms/tinacms/issues/5244)

items.headline: Improving Media Management UX
items.content: There are several media management improvements that we have on our list (image search, support for more media types, etc).

items.headline: AI Tooling
items.content: We're working on some ways to leverage AI in the content creation process.

actions.label: Do you provide an llms.txt file to make your website LLM-friendly?

items.headline: Docs Template
items.content: Since Tina works so well with documentation sites, we're building a best-of-breed Tina + Docs starter template.

items.headline: Improved PR workflow
items.content: We are making some improvements to Tina's editorial workflow that will allow you to merge Pull Requests from within the CMS UI.
